website_summaries.verdict: Soft, non-allergenic baby wipes made with plant-based ingredients.
pros: Wipes include avocado oil, aloe, and calendula extracts for gentleness
Contains no sulfates, phthalates, parabens, artificial dyes, or fragrances
cons: Some complained that the natural ingredients give off an odd smell

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Cleaners
customer_reviews.text: My baby is in high school, but I use these wipes to clean my dogs' feet. I wanted unscented because, well, she smells like a dog. The container is easy to open and close, and unlike some wipes, they come out one at a time, instead of clumps. I don't like having all sorts of scents around, and these do a great job of wiping off dirt, mulch and leaves.
customer_reviews.author: A. Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Wipes.
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write bad reviews, but the batch that I got seems to be horrible quality because it stinks! My daughter hates me using these wipes on her and she complains to me how horrible it smells. I had no choice but to purchase it because of the shortage of baby wipes, but definitely will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I use these instead of those flushable toilet wipes (we don't flush, don't worry), they are wayyy cheaper, better quality and don't have a weird scent. They get you wayyy cleaner than your adult toilet wipes (I mean, they are for messy baby bums), and a pack like this last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice for my personal hygiene, but I am pleased so far. Nice size, very moist and fragrance free. Absolutely no complaints. Shared the other two packages of 80 with family members. Baby wipes are as hard to find as toilet paper in our local stores. Pleased to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So, so
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, but not great. You have to use more than one so it ends up not being cost effective. It doesn’t really have the feel of a cloth like wipe. I gave away the last few packages. If there’s nothing else, I’ll use these but I prefer the huggies brand, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great product use on allergy prone Chihuahua paws.s
customer_reviews.text: Got for my Chihuahua baby who bites and gnaws her front paws so much because dry skin. Use after being outside on paws & so far today these baby wipes are working great!Allergies in dogs are awful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne60

customer_reviews.title: Love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes and have been using them for many years. They truly are unscented and they clean up nicely. I feel good knowing I'm using wipes without all the added chemicals. Great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Very Average, Difficult to Keep Open
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are just average in my opinion. The packaging isn't the best- the flap doesn't stay out of the way and becomes hard to deal with when you are changing a wiggly toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Looking for refund, baby is allergic
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for a refund as my baby had an awful allergic reaction to these and had to throw them out. Pain, rash, and blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Each wipe was a little smaller and thinner than i usually get
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta M Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Shipping from China
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know it was coming from China. Took months to get and they were totally dried out.
customer_reviews.author: s.waddell

customer_reviews.title: Baby wipes
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and product. Had no mold or issues with my pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good wipes for the price and didn’t seem to bother baby skin
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Peck

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby wipes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wipes to use for our baby. They don’t irritate him and are gentle. I notice a difference when we run out and have to use another brand.
customer_reviews.author: nicole g.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. No big name stores nor smaller stores had any wipes available. These came quickly and were really good.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Dollete

customer_reviews.title: Wipes were small and thin so the high price would have been for the unscented and hypoallergenic!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for personal cleansing. The product itself was overpriced. The quality would have been compared to a cheaper brand!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wolverton

customer_reviews.title: Challenging while changing a diaper
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are trash! They are very scented and not soft at all. They come out one at a time which is very frustrating when changing a diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Cadey

customer_reviews.title: I found my package, such a great item.
customer_reviews.text: I really love how well these clean up and don't cause break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They stink
customer_reviews.text: Non scented, but they leave a smell that is not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Small to Use!!
customer_reviews.text: These are ok wipes...but they are sooo small!! Made for new borns only in my opinion! I have a 3 year old Grandson and I have to use 3-4 payed out flat in order to wipe him correctly. Not a good bang for the buck in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: DO not buy! Not safe! Scented! Diaper rash!
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely 100% scented. Used for one day in my 8 month old and she has her first diaper rash EVER IN HER LIFE. I’ve used two other brands that are unscented and has no smell at all. This one has a very strong obvious scent! Not happy at all. Buy Water Wipes instead of you care about the health of your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Soft
customer_reviews.text: Just happy to find any wipes at the time we purchased them, they hold up nicely. We added some disinfecting liquid to them, as that was our need rather than as a baby wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Rouser

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are really wet, and thin, so the poo might get on you with bigger messes. They also don’t pop up the next wipe and the edges are hard to find/grab.
customer_reviews.author: Michelleb82

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. Never ripped like some name brands I had the misfortune to use. Will deffinately buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amri Evans

customer_reviews.title: Horrible damp smell, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible smell, a cross of damp towel and urine. I have never encountered anything like it from the various unscented products from other brands. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Brugger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are crap. The tab to keep them dry peals off too easily. The wipes are rough and they don’t clean off anything!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes for the most sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these wipes for the past three years. They are extremely moist and they don’t dry out easily. Being that they’re so moist and durable, I’ve used them to wipe things down and get great results each time. For example, while changing my daughters diaper I may notice some dust. I immediately grab a wipe and it picks up everything. They don’t cause skin irritation (at least for us). I do wish they cost a little less. I’ve tried cheaper and you get what you pay for. I also find that sometimes the wipes stick together and don’t come out one at a time. Putting them in a wipe dispenser controls the issue.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes and how they are on my babys skin but oh my gosh are they AWFUL smelling. I hate using them because of there stench!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Fewer wipes per pkg.
customer_reviews.text: second order did not have the 100 ct of wipes, just 80 . WHY?? Do like them.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Liked by recipient
customer_reviews.text: Sent to recipient for baby. Shipped quick - good baby wipes but high priced.
customer_reviews.author: angelface

product_meta.title: Babyganics Baby Wipes, Unscented, 240 Count (3 Packs of 80 Wipes), Packaging may vary
product_meta.description: Size:240 CountWipe without worry. It's a problem as old as time: Babies' Most sensitive places are also the messiest. Well it's about time for a solution! Hydrating and nourishing wipes that are gentle enough for faces, hands and bottom places. Our paraben-free formula let's you wipe your wee ones while our skin conditioning ingredients gently nourish, putting us at the front of clean behinds!
feature_bullets: Formulated without: parabens, sulfates, phthalates, artificial dyes or fragrances

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
